summary: This module implements Daskâ€™s global configuration system, offering utilities to load, merge, serialize and deserialize configuration data from files (YAML/JSON), environment variables, and defaults, as well as a context manager for temporary or permanent overrides of configuration values.
business_intent: Enable flexible, hierarchical configuration of Dask behavior so that users and downstream libraries can customize settings via files, environment variables, or programmatic overrides, ensuring consistent and easily adjustable runtime parameters.
